description: record identifier (use deployment @gml:id; if multiple deployments exist, pick the most recent as the record id)
association link to the parent facility record (e.g., /collections/facilities/items/{id} or codes.wmo URI) - this must be a WSI
observed variable / measurand (WMO code list URI)
geometry type for this observation/deployment (WMO code list URI)
organization name of principle investigator for this observationCapability
deployment location (parse 'lat lon [alt]' to GeoJSON Point)
validity begin time for location entry
local reference surface (WMO code list URI)
height above local reference surface value
source of observation (WMO code list URI)
unit of measure for reporting (WMO code list URI)
number of observations in reporting interval
level of data (WMO code list URI)
